advice.text: You already listed the main steps; check they match the task: read an integer, compute sum of its divisors, print result.
Make sure the flow includes: input, initialize sum, loop through candidates, test divisibility, add to sum, then print.
Now translate each comment to code: read the number, set sum = 0, use a for loop from 1 to n, inside the loop if n is divisible by i add i to sum, then print sum.
